languages.text: "Сразу видно, что последние пару веков на Тассеру имперские святоши не захаживали. Иначе б ты по-другому пела: страдать надо, молиться до темноты в глазах и еще раз страдать".

"It is plain to see that Imperial zealots have not set foot on Thassera these past centuries. Else you would be singing a different tune: that one must suffer, pray until vision fades, and then suffer yet again."
languages.original_text: "Сразу видно, что последние пару веков на Тассеру имперские святоши не захаживали. Иначе б ты по-другому пела: страдать надо, молиться до темноты в глазах и еще раз страдать".

traits.locale_text: "It is plain enough that Imperial zealots have not set foot on Thassera these past centuries. Else you would sing a different tune: that one must suffer, pray until vision fades, and suffer yet again."

"It is plain enough that Imperial zealots have not set foot on Thassera these past centuries. Else you would sing a different tune: that one must suffer, pray until vision fades, and suffer yet again."

"It is plain to see that Imperial zealots have not set foot on Thassera these past centuries. Else you would be singing a different tune: that one must suffer, pray until vision fades, and then suffer yet again."

"It is plain to see that Imperial zealots have not set foot on Thassera these past centuries. Else you would be singing a different tune: that one must suffer, pray until vision fades, and then suffer yet again."

languages.text: 「見てのとおり、帝国の狂信者どもはここ数百年、一度もタセラに来ていない。そうじゃなきゃ、今ごろは口ぶりが違ってたはずだ――『苦しめ。目がかすむまで祈れ。それでまた苦しめ』ってな」
languages.original_text: "It is plain to see that Imperial zealots have not set foot on Thassera these past centuries. Else you would be singing a different tune: that one must suffer, pray until vision fades, and then suffer yet again."

traits.locale_text: 「見てのとおり、帝国の狂信者どもはここ数百年、一度もタセラに来ていない。そうじゃなきゃ、今ごろは口ぶりが違ってたはずだ――『苦しめ。目がかすむまで祈れ。それでまた苦しめ』ってな。」

languages.text: «Salta a la vista que los fanáticos imperiales llevan siglos sin poner un pie en Thassera. De lo contrario, su cantinela sería bien distinta: que uno ha de sufrir, rezar hasta quedarse ciego y luego sufrir aún más».
languages.original_text: "It is plain to see that Imperial zealots have not set foot on Thassera these past centuries. Else you would be singing a different tune: that one must suffer, pray until vision fades, and then suffer yet again."

traits.locale_text: «Salta a la vista que los fanáticos imperiales llevan siglos sin poner un pie en Thassera. De lo contrario, su cantinela sería bien distinta: que uno ha de sufrir, rezar hasta quedarse ciego y luego sufrir aún más».

languages.text: “很显然，帝国那些狂热分子这几百年里肯定没来过塔瑟拉，否则你说出来的话肯定是另外一套——所有人都必须受苦受累，把眼睛都累瞎了，之后继续受苦受累，没完没了。”
languages.original_text: "It is plain to see that Imperial zealots have not set foot on Thassera these past centuries. Else you would be singing a different tune: that one must suffer, pray until vision fades, and then suffer yet again."

traits.locale_text: “很显然，帝国那些狂热分子这几百年里肯定没来过塔瑟拉，否则你说出来的话肯定是另外一套——所有人都必须受苦受累，把眼睛都累瞎了，之后继续受苦受累，没完没了。”

languages.text: "Es ist offensichtlich, dass Thessera seit Hunderten von Jahren keine imperialen Eiferer betreten haben. Sonst würdet Ihr andere Töne anschlagen: Dass man leiden muss, beten, bis die Vision verblasst, um dann aufs Neue zu leiden."
languages.original_text: "It is plain to see that Imperial zealots have not set foot on Thassera these past centuries. Else you would be singing a different tune: that one must suffer, pray until vision fades, and then suffer yet again."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist offensichtlich, dass Thessera seit Hunderten von Jahren keine imperialen Eiferer betreten haben. Sonst würdet Ihr andere Töne anschlagen: Dass man leiden muss, beten, bis die Vision verblasst, um dann aufs Neue zu leiden."

languages.text: « Il semble évident qu'aucun fanatique de l'Imperium n'a posé le pied sur Thassera depuis des siècles. Sinon, vous ne tiendriez pas le même discours : vous réclameriez la souffrance, la disparition des visions par la prière, et puis à nouveau la souffrance. »
languages.original_text: "It is plain to see that Imperial zealots have not set foot on Thassera these past centuries. Else you would be singing a different tune: that one must suffer, pray until vision fades, and then suffer yet again."

traits.locale_text: « Il semble évident qu'aucun fanatique de l'Imperium n'a posé le pied sur Thassera depuis des siècles. Sinon, vous ne tiendriez pas le même discours : vous réclameriez la souffrance, la disparition des visions par la prière, et puis à nouveau la souffrance. »

languages.text: "Son birkaç yüzyıldır İmparatorluk bağnazlarının Thassera'ya ayak basmadığı aşikâr. Yoksa başka bir melodi tüttürüyor olurdun: Acı çekmek, görüşün kaybolana değin dua etmek ve sonra yine acı çekmek gerektiğini söylerdin."
languages.original_text: "It is plain to see that Imperial zealots have not set foot on Thassera these past centuries. Else you would be singing a different tune: that one must suffer, pray until vision fades, and then suffer yet again."

traits.locale_text: "Son birkaç yüzyıldır İmparatorluk bağnazlarının Thassera'ya ayak basmadığı aşikâr. Yoksa başka bir melodi tüttürüyor olurdun: Acı çekmek, görüşün kaybolana değin dua etmek ve sonra yine acı çekmek gerektiğini söylerdin."
